name: Sarah Kim
bio: Lead Designer at DesignHub with a passion for creating intuitive user experiences

reviews.comment: Sarah's design insights completely transformed our product. Her UX expertise is exceptional!
Great mentor! Very patient and knowledgeable about user research methodologies.
Sarah provided excellent feedback on my portfolio. Highly recommend her for design reviews.

sessions.title: UX Design Fundamentals
sessions.description: Comprehensive overview of UX design principles and best practices

sessions.title: Portfolio Review Session
